analyzed: bhārata bhāṣāyām vimalaratnalekhaḥ nāma

original: bhoṭabhāṣāyām dri ma med pa rin po che-i phrina cesa vya va |
analyzed: bhoṭa bhāṣāyām dri ma med pa rin po chei phrina cesa vya va
guruve namaḥ
tārādevyai namaḥ

original: (1) mahāgati(?)kāyaṁ dṛṣṭvā barddhayan buddhaśāsanam dharmeṇa pālayan rājyaṁ nayapālo nṛpo'bhavat || 1 ||
analyzed: mahā gati kāyam dṛṣṭvā barddhayan buddha śāsanam dharmeṇa pālayan rājyam naya pālaḥ nṛpaḥ abhavat  /

original: tvaya pūrvvaṁ dānaṁ daśa kuśalāni poṣadhaḥ |
analyzed: tvayā pūrvvam dānam daśa kuśalāni poṣadhaḥ
kṣāntiḥ vīryam ca abhyastam iti deva tvam adhunā sampannaḥ
guruṇām ājñām dhamma anugatam sūtra ādikañca idam
bhaktyā śirasā gṛhāṇa ātma parayoḥ hitam bhavet  /
vivarjayan sarvva saśayam siddhye kuru mahā yatnam

original: nidrālutvaṁ tandrāñca vivarjayan nityamudyamaṁ kuryā vīryāya || 4 ||
analyzed: nidrālu tvam tandrām ca vivarjayan nityam udyamam kuryāḥ vīryāya
smṛti jñāna apramādena sadā indriya dvārāṇi rakṣet
ahorātram punar punar citta santānam parīkṣeta
sva doṣa jñānam cakṣuḥ iva kuryāt para doṣa jñānam tu andha vat
smṛtim anahaṅkāram śūnyatām ca sadā bhāvayet
kuryāt sva doṣa kīrttanam na aparasya bhrāntim anusandadhyāt
kīrttayet aparasya guṇam ātma guṇam tu gopayet  /
tyajet lābham satkāram ca nityam ātma khyātim tyajet

original: maitrīṁ karuṇāñca bhāvayed bodhicittaṁ sthiraṁ kuru || 8 ||
analyzed: maitrīm karuṇām ca bhāvayet bodhi cittam sthiram kuru
daśa akuśalāni heyāni sadā śraddhā dṛḍhīkāryā

original: manāgapi priyaṁ santoṣaḥ kṛtānukampā ca smarttavyam || 9 ||
analyzed: manāk api priyam santoṣaḥ kṛta anukampā ca smarttavyam

original: krodho garvañca prahātavyaṁ kāryā ca hīnacittatā |
analyzed: krodhaḥ prahātavyam kāryā ca hīna citta tā
mithyā jīvikā vivarjanīyā dharma jīvikā jīvitavyā  /
sarvam āmiṣam vivarjayet ārya dhanena
sampannam kuryyāt
sadā samājam tyajet araṇye nivaset
tyajet vācam asaṃbaddhām nityam syāt śuddha sayataḥ
guru upādhyāya daśane śraddhayā paricaryām kuryāt
viśiṣṭe puruṣe dharma cakṣuṣi pudgale
ādi karmmika sattveṣu ca śāstṛ sajñām utpādayet
duḥkha taptānām sarvveṣām sattvānām ca darśane
bodhi cittam utpādya mātṛ pitā putra sajñām ca utpādayet

original: sarvaṁ lokakṛtyaṁ tyaktvā nityaṁ samādhibhāvanāṁ kuru |
analyzed: sarvam loka kṛtyam tyaktvā nityam samādhi bhāvanām kuru
tyaja pāpa mitram
duḥśīla bhikṣūṇām anyeṣām dharmma hīnānām
pāpa ācārāṇām ca darśane teṣām nigrahāt na viramet
sarvveḥ akalyāṇa mitraiḥ sarvvaiḥ pāpa sahāyaiḥ

original: ratnatraye gurā- vupādhyāya ācārye ca śraddhāhīnaiḥ || 17 ||
analyzed: ratnatraye gurau u upādhyāya ācārye ca śraddhā hīnaiḥ
akṛtajñaiḥ raihikabuddhibhiḥ
paratra alpa śraddhaiḥ ca dina traya atikrameṇa na vaset

original: duṣṭāmaśubhāṁ bhūmiṁ parityajya yatra śubhaṁ gantavyam |
analyzed: duṣṭām aśubhām bhūmim parityajya yatra śubham gantavyam
yatra rāgaḥ tat parityājyam anāsaktam vaset  /
rāgaḥ hi sugatim aprāpayat mokṣa jīvanam chīnatti

original: yatra kalyāṇamitraṁ vasati tatra nityaṁ vaset || 20 ||
analyzed: yatra kalyāṇa mitram vasati tatra nityam vaset  /
gurum sat āśritya nityam sūtra nikāyam avalokayet
ādau yat ārabdham prathamam tat eva sādhayitavyam
anyathā na ubhayam sidhyati
anyeṣu pāpa deśanāyām parama puṇye ca yateta
vṛtta anukūlam lokam sadā para loka cittam ca rakṣet

original: (11) yadā cittamunnataṁ jāyate tadā garvaṁ chindyāt |
analyzed: yadā cittam unnatam jāyate tadā garvam chindyāt
apramāda virahe guru upadeśaḥ smarttavyaḥ
līna citte jāte citta unnatim api praśaset
smṛtvā prajñāpāramitām nikhila prapañca upaśamam kuryāt
yadā rāga dveṣa viṣayaḥ jāyate māyā prapañca vat paśyet
nindā vākya śravaṇe pratiśrutkā vat jānīyāt
kāya pīḍā udbhave pūrva karma avalokayet
prānta araṇye pravasan mṛga śava vat

original: yatra kenāpi na jñāyate [ tatra] ātmanātmānaṁ gopayet |
analyzed: yatra kena api na jñāyate tatra ātmanā ātmānam gopayet
sadā iṣṭadevatām āśrayet kāme vyāpāde middhe styāne

original: ālasye tandrāyāñca yadā cittamutpadyate tadā svapāpaṁ gaṇayet |
analyzed: ālasye tandrāyām ca yadā cittam utpadyate tadā sva pāpam gaṇayet

original: vrataṁ hṛdi smared anityatāṁ mṛtyuñca bhāvayet || 28 ||
analyzed: vratam hṛdi smaret anitya tām mṛtyuḥ ca bhāvayet
anyasya puratas avasthāna kāle śāntam ṛju ca bhāṣeta
bhrūkuṭi mukhena hāsyam prahātavyam

original: sadā smitena sthātavyaṁ nityamanyeṣu prītiśca kāryā || 29 ||
analyzed: sadā smitena sthātavyam nityam anyeṣu prītiḥ ca kāryā
amātsaryeṇa tyāge prītim kuryāt
nityam īrṣyā prahātavyā
anyasya cittam rakṣet
sarvve vādāḥ prahātavyāḥ

original: paricayena vinā nūtanena saṅgaṁ na kuryāt |
analyzed: paricayena vinā nūtanena saṅgam na kuryāt
sadā mantre samarthaḥ syāt

original: sadā kṣāntimān alpakāmaśca san santoṣaṁ kuryāt || 31 ||
analyzed: sadā kṣāntimān alpa kāmaḥ ca san santoṣam kuryāt
caṇḍāla dāsa sajñaḥ syāt lajjā jñāne apatrapāyām
tasyām para loka ārādhanāyām ca yateta
ātmasayamam kuryāt
para avajñā prahātavyā śraddhā śīlena tiṣṭhet
para upadeśa karaṇe kāruṇya upakāra cittaḥ tat kuryāt

original: (16) buddhadharmme śraddhāṁ saddharmmañca na jātu tyajet |
analyzed: buddha dharmme śraddhām saddharmam ca na jātu tyajet

original: nityaṁ ratnatraye śraddhāṁ saṁsāratrayaṁ ca pariśuddhaṁ kuryāt || 34 ||
analyzed: nityam ratnatraye śraddhām sa sāra trayam ca pariśuddham kuryāt
pūrvam karuṇā gataḥ ahorātram tri kṛtvas
prasiddhasya ārādhanā saptakasya skandha trayam gṛhṇīyāt
jagat duḥkha nirākaraṇa kāmaḥ udāra praṇidhānam sthāpayet
sattva paripākam bodhim ca icchet
sarvam mahā bodhau pariṇamayet
ciram pratijñāya sadā udyogī bhavet

original: evaṁ kṛte dvivargaḥ sampadyata āvaraṇadvayañca kṣīyate || 37 ||
analyzed: evam kṛte dvivargaḥ sampadyate āvaraṇa dvayam ca kṣīyate
nara deha lābhaḥ sārthakaḥ bhavati
dṛṣṭa dharmme nirvvāṇam bhavati
sva para arthaḥ sampadyate
parama tattvam ca prāpyate

original: (18) nidāghakokilapotaḥ madhuraṁ kūjatīti kiṁ mayūrapoto na madhuraṁ kūjati |
analyzed: nidāgha kokila potaḥ madhuram kūjati iti kim mayūra potaḥ na madhuram kūjati
yadi api bahubhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ uktam tathā api
rājñām vyasana chedāya likhitam idam
kathām śreyaḥ abhiprāyeṇa kuru
anyasmai api matimate janāya kathaya
nityam ṣaṣ devatāḥ smara śuddham vratam ācara

original: rājaṁ dharmmeṇa pālaya ātmānaṁ ca kṣamaṁ kuru || 40 ||
analyzed: rājam dharmmeṇa pālaya ātmānam ca kṣamam kuru

original: vimalaratnalekho nāma sthaviramahāpaṇḍitadīpaṅkaraśrījñānād rājñe nayapālāya preritā ślokacatvāriṁśat sampūrṇā ||
analyzed: vimalaratnalekhaḥ nāma sthavira mahā paṇḍita dīpaṅkara śrī jñānāt rājñe nayapālāya preritā śloka catvāriśat sampūrṇā

original: tasminneva kāle tenaiva guruṇā parivarttakena bhikṣuṇā jayaśīlena ca parivartitā ślokacatvāriṁśat || (20)
analyzed: tasmin eva kāle tena eva guruṇā parivarttakena bhikṣuṇā jayaśīlena ca parivartitā śloka catvāriśat
